title: Wolf Stainless Steel Outdoor Built In Natural Gas Grill OG36 - Overview
description:
Shop for the Wolf Stainless Steel Outdoor Built In Natural Gas Grill OG36 at Abt! http://www.abt.com/product/40097/Wolf-Stainless-Steel-Outdoor-Built-In-Natural-Gas-Grill-OG36.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=OG36_20160518

Key Features:

Hot Surface Ignition: Electric hot surface glow plug igniters operate by pushing in burner or rotisserie control knobs.
Hexagonal Grates: Stainless steel hexagonal grates provide more heat contact to food for even grilling.
Hood Assist System: Concealed heavy-duty extension springs allow for easy opening and closing of the hood.
Rotisserie: Two-position system maintains proper distance from the infrared burner.
Double Wall Construction: Hood front is double lined for better insulation and to prevent exterior discoloration.
Radiant and Direct Heat: Radiant heat from ceramic briquettes mixes with direct heat for more thorough grilling.
Sear Zone: 25,000 btu/hr direct heat sears meats faster and deeper to seal in juices.
Zone Dividers: Each 25,000 btu/hr burner is individually contained to control heat independently.
Classic Stainless: Heavy-duty classic stainless steel construction.
LED Lights: LED lit control knobs allow for convenient night grilling.
Halogen Lights: Two halogen lights illuminate the grilling surface.
Warming Rack: Three-position warming rack conveniently stows away when not in use.

Features:

Heavy-duty classic stainless steel construction.
Wolf signature red control knobs—optional black knobs available.
Radiant heat from ceramic briquettes mixes with direct heat for more thorough grilling.
Each 25,000 btu/hr (7.3 kW) burner is individually contained to control heat independently in each zone.
Infrared sear zone (except OG30) with 25,000 btu/hr (7.3 kW) direct heat sears meats faster to seal in juices.
Two-position rotisserie system maintains proper distance from 16,000 btu/hr (4.7 kW) infrared burner.
Stainless steel hexagonal grates provide more heat contact to food for even grilling.
Electric hot surface glow plug igniters operate by pushing in burner or rotisserie control knobs.
Hood front is double lined for better insulation and to prevent exterior discoloration.
Two halogen interior lights illuminate grilling surface.
LED lit control knobs allow for convenient night grilling.
Easy to clean pull-out drip tray.
Three-position warming rack conveniently stows away when not in use.
Hood assist system with concealed heavy-duty extension springs allow for easy opening and closing.
LP gas models include gas regulator and hose.
Accessory canvas cover and insulated liner, access doors and storage drawers for built-in applications.
